name: @jd-data-limited/easy-fm
description: easy-fm is a Node.js module that allows you to interact with a [FileMaker database stored](https://www.claris.com/filemaker/) on a [FileMaker server](https://www.claris.com/filemaker/server/). This module interacts with your server using the [FileMaker Data API](https://help.claris.com/en/data-api-guide/content/index.html).
author: JD-Data Limited
